## Call.disconnect() method

Disconnect this side of the call.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
disconnect(): Promise<void>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;

A `Promise` that - Resolves when the call has disconnected. - Rejects if the native layer cannot disconnect the call.
